name: All Brow’t That Cheddar Brow Pencil and Brow Setting Gel Set
about: What it is:A set of full-size Benefit icons, including a brow-defining pencil, the finest detailing brow pencil, and a brow setting gel...Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance..What Else You Need to Know:This full-size brow trio gives you precisely defined, detailed, AND set brows…with Precisely, My Brow Pencil (Benefit Cosmetics’ brow bestseller); Precisely, My Brow Detailer; and 24-HR Brow Setter. It’s a go-to recipe for brows that look good..This Set Contains:
ingredients: Precisely, My Brow Pencil:.Stearic Acid, Mica, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Synthetic Japan Wax, Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Jojoba Esters, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Triethylhexanoin, Aluminum Hydroxide, Tocopherol. [+/- Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide)]...Precisely, My Brow Detailer:.Stearic Acid, Mica, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Synthetic Japan Wax, Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Triethylhexanoin, Jojoba Esters, Aluminum Hydroxide, Tocopherol.  [+/- Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide)]...24-HR Brow Setter:.Aqua (Water), Alcohol, Acrylates Copolymer, Amp-Acrylates Copolymer, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Phenoxyethanol, Peg-12 Dimethicone, Caprylyl Glycol, Panthenol, Butylene Glycol, Gossypium Herbaceum (Cotton) Extract...Disclaimer: Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a Benefit product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Outline and define with Precisely, My Brow Pencil using light, short strokes..-Fill in details to tips and tails with Precisely, My Brow Detailer using light, gentle strokes. .-Brush 24-HR Brow Setter through brows to lock in your look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m honestly surprised by the low rating for this value pack. I already use the benefit brow pencil and setter and fell in love with the detailed pencil. I think it’s my new favourite and I wouldn’t have tried it if it wasn’t throw in. I love the pigment
